channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cycle path cleaning, 15th January
item.description:
The new cycle path up the hill is a joke. It has not seen a road sweeper since it was installed and so debris and detritus litter the cycle path making it dangerous to ride on. Either clean the path or reinstate the 2 lanes of traffic. Vehicles are often parked in the cycle lane too which adds to the danger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW10 problem, 15th January
item.description:
RUTTING AND DEPRESSION PLEASE LEVEL OUT 1500 X 1000 X 40MM NOT MARKED TEMPORARY ROAD CLOSURE (CW10 Rutting&Depressions)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 14th January
item.description:
More rubbish dumped here. It’s a constant problem every week. Why don’t you do something to catch the culprits?

item.title: Sign knocked over, 14th January
item.description:
I reported this some time ago but the sign remains on the floor having been hit over.In the triangle of verge in between both roads I believe the site had it marked as completed . Please collect the broken sign and replace the directional signs Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Pothole not fixed as stated. Fixed original pothole and then painted the other one, 14th January
item.description:
You came and filled the original pothole and painted my pothole. You’ve closed my call saying it’s being repaired but it’s not. Why didn’t you just repair both at the same time. Reported pothole is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
